basic.description: An introduction to musical notation, ear-training and analysis for non-B.Mus. students. NOTE    May not be taken by students at Level 4 or who hold the Royal Conservatory Grade II Rudiments with First-Class Honours standing.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Introduction to Music Fundamentals

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Exclusion   No more than 1 course from MUSC P06; MUSC104 (formerly P52)
ONE WAY EXCLUSION  May not be taken with or after MUSC191
